meanings.sent1: She loves sequining her dance costumes for performances.
meanings.sent2: I will be sequining my dress for the party tonight.
meanings.sent3: The cat tried sequining its fur with glittery sequins, but ended up looking silly.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter sequined the room with joy and happiness.
meanings.sent5: The sun sequined the water with a thousand shimmering lights.

meanings.definition: The act of adding sequins to something.
meanings.sent1: Her sequining of the dress made it sparkle under the lights.
meanings.sent2: I enjoy the sequining process when creating costumes.
meanings.sent3: The sequining on the jacket caught everyone's attention at the event.
meanings.sent4: The sequining on the stage curtain added a touch of glamour to the performance.
meanings.sent5: The sequining on the mask transformed it into a dazzling work of art.
